welcome_message_title: Welcome to Vila Nova de Gaia
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vila Nova de Gaia, where the charm of historic port wine cellars meets the beauty of the Douro River. Explore our vibrant city, known for its stunning views, delicious cuisine, and rich culture. Enjoy your stay and make the most of all that Vila Nova de Gaia has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braga Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Braga Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
